entry.title: C++ç±»æ¨¡æ¿å®ç°çš„æ ˆç±»
entry.content:
/*********************Stackç±»æ¨¡æ¿***********************/
/*
æ¥å£å‡½æ•°:   StackClass()            -é»˜è®¤æ„é€ å‡½æ•°
            void push(T data);      -å‹æ ˆ
            T pop();                -å¼¹æ ˆ
            T getTop();             -è·å–æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ 
            bool isEmpty();         -åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
            bool isFull();          -åˆ¤æ–­æ ˆæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ»¡
            void setNull();         -æ ˆæ¸…ç©º
            class Empty{};          -å¼‚å¸¸å†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œå½“æ ˆä¸‹æº¢æŠ›å‡º
            class Full{};           -å¼‚å¸¸å†…éƒ¨ç±»ï¼Œå½“æ ˆä¸Šæº¢æŠ›å‡º
*/
#ifndef STACKCLASS_HPP
#define STACKCLASS_HPP

template <class T, int capacity = 100>
class StackClass
{
private:
    T *point;
    int top;

public:
    StackClass();
    ~StackClass();
    void push(T data);
    T pop();
    T getTop();
    bool isEmpty();
    bool isFull();
    void setNull();
    class Empty
    {
    };
    class Full
    {
    };
};

template <class T, int capacity>
StackClass<T, capacity>::StackClass()
{
    //size = capacity;
    top = -1;
    point = new T[capacity];
}
template <class T, int capacity>
StackClass<T, capacity>::~StackClass()
{
    delete[] point;
}
template <class T, int capacity>
void StackClass<T, capacity>::push(T data)
{
    if (isFull())
    {
        throw Full();
    }
    else
    {
        point[++top] = data;
    }
}
template <class T, int capacity>
T StackClass<T, capacity>::pop()
{
    if (isEmpty())
    {
        throw Empty();
    }
    else
    {
        return point[top--];
    }
}
template <class T, int capacity>
T StackClass<T, capacity>::getTop()
{
    if (!isEmpty())
        return point[top];
}
template <class T, int capacity>
bool StackClass<T, capacity>::isEmpty()
{
    if (top == -1)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
template <class T, int capacity>
bool StackClass<T, capacity>::isFull()
{
    if (top == capacity - 1)
        return true;
    else
        return false;
}
template <class T, int capacity>
void StackClass<T, capacity>::setNull()
{
    top = -1;
}

#endif
